name: Aloe Vera
description: A succulent plant known for its medicinal properties and easy care.
tips: Allow soil to dry out completely between waterings.

name: Snake Plant
description: An extremely hardy houseplant that tolerates low light and infrequent watering.
tips: Avoid overwatering; thrives in dry conditions.

name: Spider Plant
description: A popular indoor plant with arching green and white leaves.
tips: Trim brown tips and repot when crowded.

name: Peace Lily
description: Elegant white flowers and deep green leaves; great air purifier.
tips: Keep soil moist but not soggy.

name: Pothos
description: Vining plant known for heart-shaped leaves and easy growth.
tips: Cut back vines to encourage bushier growth.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
description: Large-leaved tropical plant that makes a bold statement indoors.
tips: Avoid drafts; rotate for even growth.

name: ZZ Plant
description: Low-maintenance plant with glossy, dark green leaves.
tips: Tolerates neglect and low light very well.

name: Rubber Plant
description: Thick, shiny leaves make it a favorite indoor tree.
tips: Wipe leaves regularly to remove dust.

name: Boston Fern
description: Lush green fronds that add volume to any space.

name: Jade Plant
description: Succulent plant often seen as a symbol of prosperity.
